channel.title: As Transport on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in As Transport on funPlantGenes

item.title: BIGE1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Zm00001eb211050 Gene Symbol: BIGE1 Gene Name: Big embryo 1 Genome: Zm-B73-REFERENCE-NAM-5.

item.title: BjCdR15
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: BjCdR15 Gene Name: BZIP transcription factor15 Genome: Species: Brassica juncea Functional Descriptions: The Brassica juncea BjCdR15, an ortholog of Arabidopsis TGA3, is a regulator of cadmium uptake, transport and accumulation in shoots and confers cadmium tolerance in transgenic plants.

item.title: BnaA4.BOR2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: BnaAnn31830D Gene Symbol: BnaA4.BOR2 Gene Name: B efflux transporter Genome: Brassica napus Genome Resources Species: Brassica napus Functional Descriptions: BnaA4.

item.title: BrpABI449
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: BrpABI449 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Brassica rapa Functional Descriptions: BrpNAC895 and BrpABI449 coregulate the transcription of the afflux-type cadmium transporter BrpHMA2 in Brassica parachinensis.

item.title: BrpHMA2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: BrpHMA2 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Brassica rapa Functional Descriptions: BrpHMA2 was induced by Cd stress and specifically expressed in vascular tissues, and the protein was localized in the plasma membrane.

item.title: BrpNAC895
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: BrpNAC895 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Brassica rapa Functional Descriptions: BrpNAC895 and BrpABI449 coregulate the transcription of the afflux-type cadmium transporter BrpHMA2 in Brassica parachinensis.

item.title: BrYUC6a
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: BraA02g041530 Gene Symbol: BrYUC6a Gene Name: YUC6a protein Genome: Species: Brassica campestris Functional Descriptions: In CST versus CKT, the auxin biosynthesis genes such as YUC6 were down-regulated, while the auxin transport and signal transduction genes were dysregulated.

item.title: BrYUC6b
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: BraA06g032880 Gene Symbol: BrYUC6b Gene Name: YUC6b protein Genome: Species: Brassica campestris Functional Descriptions: In CST versus CKT, the auxin biosynthesis genes such as YUC6 were down-regulated, while the auxin transport and signal transduction genes were dysregulated.

item.title: BrYUC6c
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: BraA09g005830 Gene Symbol: BrYUC6c Gene Name: YUC6c protein Genome: Species: Brassica campestris Functional Descriptions: In CST versus CKT, the auxin biosynthesis genes such as YUC6 were down-regulated, while the auxin transport and signal transduction genes were dysregulated.

item.title: CmANR1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CmANR1 Gene Name: MADS-box TF Genome: Species: Chrysanthemum morifolium Functional Descriptions: Identified bric-a-brac, tramtrack and broad (BTB) and transcription adapter putative zinc finger (TAZ) domain protein CmBT1 as the interacting partner of CmANR1 through a yeast-two-hybrid (Y2H) screening library.

item.title: CmCNIH1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: CmoCh07G013500 Gene Symbol: CmCNIH1 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Cucurbita moschata Functional Descriptions: CmCNIH1 improves salt tolerance by influencing the trafficking of CmHKT1|1 in pumpkin.

item.title: CsAAP2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: CsaV3_4G030920;Csa4G470690 Gene Symbol: CsAAP2 Gene Name: Amino Acid Permease 2 Genome: Cucurbit Genomics Database Species: Cucumis sativus Functional Descriptions: Disruption of the amino acid transporter CsAAP2 inhibits auxin-mediated root development in cucumber.

item.title: CsGRP1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CsGRP1 Gene Name: cell wall glycine-rich protein 1 Genome: Species: Cucumis sativus Functional Descriptions: Differential accumulation of the mRNA of the auxin-repressed gene CsGRP1 and the auxin-induced peg formation during gravimorphogenesis of cucumber seedlings.

item.title: CsLHT1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: TEA026462 Gene Symbol: CsLHT1 Gene Name: Genome: TeaPGDB V1.

item.title: CsLHT6
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: TEA003706 Gene Symbol: CsLHT6 Gene Name: Genome: TeaPGDB V1.

item.title: CsSUP
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Csa3G012410 Gene Symbol: CsSUP Gene Name: Genome: Cucumber (Chinese Long) v2 Genome Species: Cucumis sativus Functional Descriptions: A Functional Allele of CsFUL1 Regulates Fruit Length through Repressing CsSUP and Inhibiting Auxin Transport in Cucumber.

item.title: CsTT8
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Cs5g31400 Gene Symbol: CsTT8 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Citrus sinensis Functional Descriptions: CsTT8 regulates anthocyanin accumulation in blood orange through alternative splicing transcription.

item.title: CsUGT84J2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: TEA000239 Gene Symbol: CsUGT84J2 Gene Name: Al-induced glycosyltransferase Genome: Species: Camellia sinensis Functional Descriptions: Found that flavonol glycoside levels in tea roots increased following Al treatment, and the Al-induced UDP glycosyltransferase CsUGT84J2 was involved in this mechanism.

item.title: DFR
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Capana02g002763 Gene Symbol: DFR Gene Name: dihydroflavonol 4-reductase Genome: Species: Capsicum annuum Functional Descriptions: The bHLH1-DTX35/DFR module regulates pollen fertility by promoting flavonoid biosynthesis in Capsicum annuum L.

item.title: DTX35
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Capana03g002183 Gene Symbol: DTX35 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Capsicum annuum Functional Descriptions: The CabHLH1-DTX35/DFR module regulates pollen fertility by promoting flavonoid biosynthesis in Capsicum annuum L.

item.title: Gl13
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Zm00001eb122470 Gene Symbol: Gl13 Gene Name: glossy13 Genome: Zm-B73-REFERENCE-NAM-5.

item.title: GmAAP6a
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.17g192000 Gene Symbol: GmAAP6a Gene Name: Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a2_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: Overexpression of GmAAP6a enhances tolerance to low nitrogen and improves seed nitrogen status by optimizing amino acid partitioning in soybean.

item.title: GmYSL7
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.11G203400 Gene Symbol: GmYSL7 Gene Name: Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a4_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: GmYSL7 controls iron uptake, allocation, and cellular response of nodules in soybean.

item.title: HvALMT1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: HvALMT1 Gene Name: Aluminum-Activated Malate Transporter 1 Genome: Species: Hordeum vulgare Functional Descriptions: HvALMT1 from barley is involved in the transport of organic anions.

item.title: HvBot1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: HvBot1 Gene Name: Clipper boron transporter Genome: Species: Hordeum vulgare Functional Descriptions: Similar to HvBot1, the tolerant HvNIP2|1 allele was unique to the Sahara barley accessions.

item.title: HvHMA2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: HvHMA2 Gene Name: heavy metal transporter Genome: Species: Hordeum vulgare Functional Descriptions: HvHMA2, a P1B-ATPase from Barley, Is Highly Conserved among Cereals and Functions in Zn and Cd Transport.

item.title: HvNIP2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: HvNIP2|1 Gene Name: Nodulin-26 like intrinsic protein Genome: Species: Hordeum vulgare Functional Descriptions: Boron Toxicity Tolerance in Barley through Reduced Expression of the Multifunctional Aquaporin HvNIP2|1|HvNIP2|1.

item.title: HvPTR1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: HvPTR1 Gene Name: peptide transporter1 Genome: Species: Hordeum vulgare Functional Descriptions: A role for phosphorylation in the regulation of the barley scutellar peptide transporter HvPTR1 by amino acids.

item.title: HvSTP13
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: HvSTP13 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Hordeum vulgare Functional Descriptions: The expression of HvSTP13 increased on bacterial and fungal pathogen-associated molecular pattern (PAMP) application, suggesting a PAMP-triggered signalling that converged on the transcriptional induction of the gene.

item.title: LeIRT2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: LeIRT2 Gene Name: iron-regulated transporter 2 Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: To extend our molecular knowledge of Fe transport in crop plants, we have isolated two cDNAs (LeIRT1 and LeIRT2) from a library constructed from roots of iron-deficient tomato (Solanum lycopersicum) plants, using the Arabidopsis iron transporter cDNA, IRT1, as a probe.

item.title: MdSWEET9b
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MdSWEET9b Gene Name: sugars will eventually be exported transporter Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: Abscisic acid and regulation of the sugar transporter gene MdSWEET9b promote apple sugar accumulation.

item.title: MeCGTR1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Manes.17G021100 Gene Symbol: MeCGTR1 Gene Name: Genome: Manihot esculenta, v8.

item.title: MePIP2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MePIP2|7 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Manihot esculenta Functional Descriptions: Found that the cassava aquaporin MePIP2|7|MePIP2|7 was involved in Mg2+ transport through interaction with MeMGT9, a lower affinity magnesium transporter protein.

item.title: MtCRE1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MtrunA17Chr8g0392301 Gene Symbol: MtCRE1 Gene Name: Cytokinin Response Element 1 Genome: M.

item.title: NPF7.6
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Mtr.27727.1 Gene Symbol: NPF7.6 Gene Name: Genome: JCVI Mt 4.

item.title: NRT1.1A
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Bradi3g16670 Gene Symbol: NRT1.1A Gene Name: Genome: reference Bd21 genome Species: Brachypodium distachyon Functional Descriptions: NRT1.

item.title: NtMATE21
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: NtMATE21 Gene Name: multidrug and toxic compound extrusion21 Genome: Species: Nicotiana tabacum Functional Descriptions: NtMATE21 and NtMATE22, and demonstrate their role in flavonol transport and in plant growth and development.

item.title: NtMATE22
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: NtMATE22 Gene Name: multidrug and toxic compound extrusion22 Genome: Species: Nicotiana tabacum Functional Descriptions: NtMATE21 and NtMATE22, and demonstrate their role in flavonol transport and in plant growth and development.

item.title: OsABCC1;MRP1
item.description: Gene Details: MSU gene ID: LOC_Os04g52900 RAPdb gene ID: Os04g0620000 Gene Symbol: OsABCC1 MRP1 Gene Name: Genome: MSU7 , IRGSP-1.

item.title: OsDOF11
item.description: Gene Details: MSU gene ID: LOC_Os02g47810 RAPdb gene ID: Os02g0707200 Gene Symbol: OsDOF11 Gene Name: Genome: MSU7 , IRGSP-1.

item.title: PbABCG1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PbABCG1 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Phalaenopsis bellina Functional Descriptions: PbABCG1 and PbABCG2 transporters are required for the emission of floral monoterpenes in Phalaenopsis bellina.

item.title: PbABCG2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PbABCG2 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Phalaenopsis bellina Functional Descriptions: PbABCG1 and PbABCG2 transporters are required for the emission of floral monoterpenes in Phalaenopsis bellina.

item.title: PbTST4
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Pbr032130.1 Gene Symbol: PbTST4 Gene Name: tonoplast membrane sugar transporter Genome: Species: Pyrus bretschneideri Functional Descriptions: Furthermore, PbCPK28 interacts with and phosphorylates PbTST4, a proton antiporter, thereby coupling the sugar import into the vacuole with proton export.

item.title: PtrXB38
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Potri.010G070800.6 Gene Symbol: PtrXB38 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Populus trichocarpa Functional Descriptions: Expression quantitative trait loci mapping identified PtrXB38 as a key hub gene in adventitious root development in Populus.

item.title: PyWRKY26
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Pbr013092.1 Gene Symbol: PyWRKY26 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Pyrus communis Functional Descriptions: PyWRKY26 and PybHLH3 cotargeted the PyMYB114 promoter to regulate anthocyanin biosynthesis and transport in red-skinned pears.

item.title: SbMATE
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Sb03g043890 Gene Symbol: SbMATE Gene Name: multi-drug and toxic compound extrusion Genome: Species: Sorghum bicolor Functional Descriptions: Sugarcane plants constitutively overexpressing the Sorghum bicolor MATE gene (SbMATE) showed improved tolerance to Al when compared to non-transgenic (NT) plants, characterized by sustained root growth and exclusion of aluminum from the root apex based on the result obtained with hematoxylin staining.

item.title: SlALMT5
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: SlALMT5 Gene Name: aluminum-activated malate transporter 5 Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: Two Members of the Aluminum-Activated Malate Transporter Family, SlALMT4 and SlALMT5, are Expressed during Fruit Development, and the Overexpression of SlALMT5 Alters Organic Acid Contents in Seeds in Tomato.

item.title: SlBEL11
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Solyc11g068950 Gene Symbol: SlBEL11 Gene Name: S.

item.title: SlJUL
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Solyc08g067180.3.1 Gene Symbol: SlJUL Gene Name: Genome: Tomato Genome version SL4.

item.title: TaALMT1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: TaALMT1 Gene Name: aluminium-activated malate transporter 1 Genome: Species: Triticum aestivum Functional Descriptions: Role of TaALMT1 malate-GABA transporter in alkaline pH tolerance of wheat.

item.title: TaHMA2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: TaHMA2 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Triticum aestivum Functional Descriptions: Se treatment significantly decreased the expression of TaHMA2 in root, indicating that the downregulation of TaHMA2 by Se might contribute to the inhibition of Cd root-to-shoot translocation and the final decrease in Cd accumulation in the shoot of winter wheat.

item.title: TaSTP3

item.title: TraesCS5A02G542600
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: TraesCS5A02G542600 Gene Symbol: TraesCS5A02G542600 Gene Name: transmembrane transporter Genome: Species: Triticum aestivum Functional Descriptions: We identified putative candidate genes that are potentially involved in metal uptake, transport, and assimilation, including TraesCS5A02G542600 on chromosome 5A, which was annotated as a Major Facilitator Superfamily transporter and acted on all the minerals except K.

item.title: VvCAX3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: VvCAX3 Gene Name: Vacuolar cation/H+ exchanger 3 Genome: Species: Vitis vinifera Functional Descriptions: The grapevine VvCAX3 is a cation/H+ exchanger involved in vacuolar Ca2+ homeostasis.
